about_the_game:
A strategy based racing game where you must manage your stamina as you determine whether you should follow behind the other racers or push the pace.
Customize your character and get ready to take on the competition as you try to win the race and compete for a top spot on the leaderboards. Maneuver the course and avoid obstacles as you tap to keep the rhythm of the race. There are three difficulties to choose from, but be forewarned this game demands as much toughness and patience as the sport (and kart racers) that inspired it. No Ads…Ever....Just good, old-fashioned Cross Country Racing.
